To provide a helpful knowledge that can save lives by giving the best care to every patient through first aid , education and research.
To become the standard and top medical app that provides free medical support offline while also providing the most updated medical knowledge that is easily accessible to the masses.

The information on this application is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content, including text, graphics, images and information, contained on or available through this mobile application is for general information purposes only.

 AIDIWOW makes no representation and assumes no responsibility for the accuracy of information contained on or available through this mobile app, and such information is subject to change without notice. You are encouraged to confirm any information obtained from or through this web site with other sources, and review all information regarding any medical condition or treatment with your physician. 

NEVER DISREGARD PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY SEEKING MEDICAL TREATMENT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ ON OR ACCESSED THROUGH THIS APP.

Just less than a year ago, we became fascinated by the idea of developing an AI first aid assistant. What if anyone could carry out first aid just as good as trained first aiders? Or gain access to medical knowledge which could be useful during emergencies? It may sound eccentric but what if we could make it happen? All in one app. All in your hands. That is AIDIWOW.
